title: GREAT 3BD/3BA Uptown Townhome! Recent Construction, 1 MONTH FREE!
posting_body: ['GREAT 3BD/3BA Uptown Townhome!', 'Recent Construction, 1 MONTH FREE!', 'Avail.', 'NOW!', 'Property Address', '2424 Lyndale Ave S - Unit 3 | Minneapolis, MN 55408', 'Available: Now', 'Offered By', 'Perkins Levin Property Management |', 'show contact info', 'Description', 'We are currently running a leasing special of 1 MONTH FREE for a 12 month lease or 2 MONTHS FREE for a 22-23 month lease.', 'BESIDES THIS UNIT BEING NEWER CONSTRUCTION - there are many great things you will LOVE about this place:', '-Big bedrooms & lots of closet space', '-Private Laundry', '-Beautiful kitchen w/ granite counters, new cabinetry, stainless steel appliances (including: dishwasher/garbage disposal) & marble back-splash', '-Hardwood floors', '-AC/Forced Heat', '-Lots of Windows & Natural Light', '-Private porch', '-Pet friendly (pet rent = $50/month)', '-Premium Uptown location', '-Professional Management & Online Rent Pay', 'For questions or a showing contact Alex', 'show contact info', '(text/email preferred).', 'Water/Trash/Sewage Utility =', 'Flat rate $75/month, tenants also responsible for gas and electric.', 'Amenities', 'Porch', 'Hardwood Floors', 'In-Unit Laundry', 'Professional Management', 'Professional Maintenance', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Forced Heat', 'Central A/C', 'Pet Friendly', 'Online Rent Pay', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 3BD/3.0BA', 'Square Feet: 1,376', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $2,395.00', 'Available: Now', 'Application Fee: $25.00', 'Security Deposit: $2,395.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed', 'Dogs allowed']
